name: Libertine Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Citrus & Woods.Key Notes:Awakening Pomelo, Uninhibited Hibiscus, Provocative Cedarwood.Fragrance Description:Libertine Eau de Parfum is an aromatic citrus perfume featuring notes of awakening pomelo, uninhibited hibiscus, and provocative cedarwood that evokes the scent of freedom..About the Bottle:Inspired by an antique ink flask, the bottle is sensuous, smooth, and comfortable to hold, with fluted glass panels. Ribbed glass is a signature look seen throughout The Maker Hotel, from fragrance and candles, glassware, and lighting fixtures. Made with post-consumer-recycled glass, The Maker uses 27 percent less glass than traditional perfume bottles and C02-free production methods..About the Fragrance:Inspired by a moment of complete freedom.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Fragrance (parfum), Water (eau), Citral, Geraniol, Citronellol, Hydroxycitronellal...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love pomelo and other citrus scents, along with earthy woods - this one is beautifully crafted! You first get a huge burst of juicy grapefruit peel without any bitterness and then it dries down into a lighter fresh citrus mixed with warm cedar/oud/vanilla and a touch floral finish. It‚Äôs perfect for a summer evening! Mix with Paradiso for a captivating citrus experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is very strong and has a strong hint of vanilla to it. But it is also somewhat fruity at the same time as woodsy. I really love how strong it is and long lasting it is as well. I can‚Äôt wait to try other scents from this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly I love the Maker Libertine Eau de Parfum scent. I wear it everyday and it lasts all day long! I have received so many compliments when I have it on! The fragrance is cedar wood, hibiscus and pomelo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Libertine Eau de Parfum is like a confident stroll through a dreamy garden at golden hour‚Äîsophisticated, warm, and just the right amount of daring. It layers beautifully, with floral notes that feel rich but not overpowering, and a soft, sensual dry-down that lingers all day. If you're looking for a signature scent that turns heads and sparks compliments, this is the one ! A total vibe in a bottle.I love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Libertine is a really lovely citrusy and woody fragrance. You initially get this big bright pop of a citrusy grapefruit note that is so fresh and so light. It‚Äôs zesty without smelling bitter. Then it dries down to a creamy woody smell with a hint of citrus. It‚Äôs honestly a really great fragrance for anyone to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good perfume. The scent lasts a while and the bottle is very sophisticated looking. It has a very strong citrus smell. Unfortunately, I don‚Äôt think the scent is for me but it is a good perfume due to longevity and strength of scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how  refreshing the scent is! It has such an uplifting feel to it, the pomelo adds such a tangy and citrusy freshness, and the cedar balances it with woody undertones! This is perfect for people like myself who enjoy citrus fragrances but want something with more depth than a purely fruity scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a super fresh and unisex fragrance my partner loved it and we used it together, the notes are delicious and very refreshing an excellent perfume for camping days and outdoor outings leaves that aroma impregnated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent exceeded my expectations. I was worried it would be too sweet for me but it‚Äôs so well balanced. I love a more masculine scent and this does it without being overpowering. This is a scent I will continue to purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is my first time trying The Maker and I am already a fan. This fragrance captures the warmth of autumn, blending the coziness of wood with the earthiness of fallen leaves. I also love how the scent is not very strong and overbearing. Extra plus for the perfume being long lasting!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow!!! I'm completely in love with the scent of this perfume ü§ç It's irresistible, with sensual and enchanting notes that leave an enveloping and magical trail wherever I go. It's become my favorite of the moment, and I'll definitely keep wearing it throughout the summer too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start my review mentioning my first impression about the packaging, for one moment I thought was a Christmas presentation just for the color and trees, but looks like is the actually packaging, for the scent it is something that I would wear on winter season, it has a a combination of delicate and strong notes, I was surprised that lasted for more than 12 hours. My PH approves this fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôd describe this perfume as more of a daytime scent‚Äîfresh and relaxing with a crisp citrus note. I love how airy it feels, and it‚Äôs surprisingly long-lasting. I can totally see myself wearing this to the gym, a coffee run, or a brunch date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Libertine Eau de Parfum by The Maker is an amazing scent! The key notes of awakening pomelo, uninhibited hibiscus, and provocative cedarwood definitely evoke the scent of freedom. The citrus wakes me up and gets me going when I put on this fragrance in the morning. I feel beautiful wearing it. This is a great fragrance for fall!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying out this brand and I'm pretty impressed. The scent is very clean and fresh. It has a citrus undertone with a hint of musk from the cedarwood. It lingered on my skin all-day, and I have really enjoyed it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Libertine Eau de Parfum is a fragrance that perfectly captures the essence of sensuality, freedom, and a touch of wildness. It's a scent for those who live unapologetically, embracing both the bold and the subtle. The perfume opens with a rich, warm blend of spices that immediately sets a luxurious tone. Notes of incense and leather create a smoky, mysterious allure, balanced beautifully with soft florals and earthy undertones. Libertine is grounded with a deep, resinous amber that lingers, giving the fragrance a lasting power that stays with you throughout the day. I received this in exchange for post .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Maker Libertine Eau De Parfum is a super captivating fragrance that embodies sophistication and allure. It opens with a bold blend of citrus and spice, creating an invigorating and slightly provocative top note. As it settles, it reveals a delicate floral and herbal element, adding depth and complexity. The dry-down is a warm, sensual mix of amber and musk, leaving a lasting impression that is both elegant and seductive. Perfect for those who appreciate a fragrance that evolves over time, Libertine is definitely one of those perfumes that gives testament to The Maker‚Äôs commitment to high-quality, unique scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is very unique. It is woody with a floral hint. The scent is not too powerful. I feel it could be worn by all genders. You will need to reapply regularly to keep the scent on all day. Very different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôd describe this perfume as more of a daytime scent‚Äîfresh and relaxing with a crisp citrus note. I love how airy it feels, and it‚Äôs surprisingly long-lasting. I can totally see myself wearing this to the gym, a coffee run, or a brunch date.
